collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (3 total Queries, 3 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT tbl_books.title, authors.Name, borrow.borrow_date, borrow.return_date, returend_books.retuned_date, charge.price, charge.desriptions, charge.charge_date FROM borrow INNER JOIN tbl_books ON tbl_books.book_id = borrow.book_id INNER JOIN authors ON authors.author_id = tbl_books.author_id INNER JOIN returend_books ON returend_books.boorow_id = borrow.b_id LEFT JOIN charge ON charge.boorow_id = borrow.b_id WHERE borrow.lib_user_id = '0001101011' ORDER BY returend_books.retuned_date DESC

SELECT charge.charge_id, tbl_books.title, authors.Name, borrow.borrow_date, borrow.return_date, returend_books.retuned_date, returend_books.status, charge.price AS total_charge, IFNULL(SUM(payment.price), 0) AS total_paid, (charge.price - IFNULL(SUM(payment.price), 0)) AS balance_due, charge.desriptions, charge.charge_date FROM borrow INNER JOIN tbl_books ON tbl_books.book_id = borrow.book_id INNER JOIN authors ON authors.author_id = tbl_books.author_id INNER JOIN returend_books ON returend_books.boorow_id = borrow.b_id LEFT JOIN charge ON charge.boorow_id = borrow.b_id LEFT JOIN payment ON payment.charge_id = charge.charge_id WHERE borrow.lib_user_id = '0001101011' GROUP BY charge.charge_id HAVING balance_due > 0 ORDER BY returend_books.retuned_date DESC
SELECT ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(price), 0) FROM charge WHERE user_id = '0001101011' ) - ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(price), 0) FROM payment WHERE user_id = '0001101011' ) AS balance

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT tbl_books.title, authors.Name, borrow.borrow_date, borrow.return_date, returend_books.retuned_date, charge.price, charge.desriptions, charge.charge_date FROM borrow INNER JOIN tbl_books ON tbl_books.book_id = borrow.book_id INNER JOIN authors ON authors.author_id = tbl_books.author_id INNER JOIN returend_books ON returend_books.boorow_id = borrow.b_id LEFT JOIN charge ON charge.boorow_id = borrow.b_id WHERE borrow.lib_user_id = '0001101011' ORDER BY returend_books.retuned_date DESC

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT charge.charge_id, tbl_books.title, authors.Name, borrow.borrow_date, borrow.return_date, returend_books.retuned_date, returend_books.status, charge.price AS total_charge, IFNULL(SUM(payment.price), 0) AS total_paid, (charge.price - IFNULL(SUM(payment.price), 0)) AS balance_due, charge.desriptions, charge.charge_date FROM borrow INNER JOIN tbl_books ON tbl_books.book_id = borrow.book_id INNER JOIN authors ON authors.author_id = tbl_books.author_id INNER JOIN returend_books ON returend_books.boorow_id = borrow.b_id LEFT JOIN charge ON charge.boorow_id = borrow.b_id LEFT JOIN payment ON payment.charge_id = charge.charge_id WHERE borrow.lib_user_id = '0001101011' GROUP BY charge.charge_id HAVING balance_due > 0 ORDER BY returend_books.retuned_date DESC

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(price), 0) FROM charge WHERE user_id = '0001101011' ) - ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(price), 0) FROM payment WHERE user_id = '0001101011' ) AS balance
